summary: Completed frontend testing of Transfers Chat application. Successfully verified Stories feature, Cloud Storage, Archive functionality, and UI components. Most requested features are working properly, but session management issues prevent complete testing of message edit/delete operations.

authentication_issues.issue: User sessions expire frequently, requiring repeated login during testing

integration_issues.issue: Cannot complete full testing of edit/delete message functionality due to session expiration

passed_tests: Stories feature - view stories from sidebar (working perfectly)
Stories feature - add new story dialog with image/text options
Story viewer opens and displays stories correctly with Arabic captions
Cloud Storage - accessible from main menu
Cloud Storage - shows files list with proper Arabic names
Archive tab - visible in tabs bar with proper Arabic label
Archive conversation - right-click context menu shows archive option
Unarchive conversation - context menu shows unarchive option
Arabic RTL layout working correctly throughout the interface
Chat interface loads properly with sidebar and conversations
Navigation between different tabs (All, Personal, Groups, Channels, Archive)
User authentication works with test credentials
Responsive design and proper Arabic localization

success_percentage.frontend: 85% - Most features working, session management needs improvement

action_item_for_main_agent: MEDIUM PRIORITY: Improve session management to prevent frequent logouts during usage. This will enable better testing of message edit/delete functionality. All major requested features (Stories, Cloud Storage, Archive) are working correctly.
